```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(xtable)
```

```{r}
anscombe
```


```{r}
ansc <-
  bind_cols(
    anscombe %>% 
      select(matches("x")) %>% 
      gather(dataset, "x"),
    anscombe %>% 
      select(matches("y")) %>% 
      gather(key, "y")
  ) %>%
  select(-key) %>% 
  mutate(dataset = gsub("x", "", dataset)) %>%  
  as_tibble()
```
```{r}
ansc
```
```{r}
ansc %>%
  group_by(dataset) %>%
  summarise(
    mean_x = mean(x),
    stdev_x = sd(x),
    mean_y = mean(y),
    stdev_y = sd(y)
  )
```
```{r}
ansc %>% ggplot(aes(x, y, color = dataset)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~dataset, ncol = 2)
```
